MAX_SEARCH_DISTANCE.comment: Max Biome Search Distance in Blocks as a radius around the Wayfinder's current position

COOLDOWN.comment: Cooldown in seconds before the player can use the Wayfinder again

SCARED_PROJECTILE_MOB_DISTANCE.comment: Block distance around the Wayfinder as a radius to which they wayfinder will become scared if a projectile mob is in

TELEPORT_TO_OWNER.comment: Amount of time in Seconds before the wayfinder attempts to teleport to it's owner if it's out of range

DISABLE_SOUNDS_WHEN_SITTING.comment: Disable Sounds for the Wayfinder when sitting

EMERALD_DEATH_COST_MULTIPLIER.comment: Amount of Wayfinder Deaths the player has mulplied by the number set here will calculate the emerald cost for them to summon a new wayfinder

ACTIVATION_COOLDOWN.comment: Amount Of Time in Seconds till the Wayfinder Heart Block can be Activated (Spawn in wayfinder) again after the last time
